articles.title: MLB roundup: Jays belt 8 HRs in record-setting rout of Red Sox - Reuters
articles.description: Teoscar Hernandez slugged two of the Blue Jays' eight home runs and had a career-high six RBIs, Robbie Ray struck out 10 over six innings of three-run ball and the visiting Toronto Blue Jays routed the Boston Red Sox 18-4 on Sunday afternoon.
